name: Lockwood Antique Copper
description: An antique copper finish, providing a warm, aged appearance. May patina further over time.
notes_on_application: Often chosen for heritage or decorative styles. May be a living finish.
care_instructions: Gentle cleaning; consult manufacturer for specific care if it's a living finish.

name: Lockwood Architectural Bronze Unlacquered
description: An unlacquered architectural bronze finish designed to patina naturally over time, developing unique character.
notes_on_application: Appearance will change with age and exposure. Desired for its evolving look.
care_instructions: Can be allowed to patina naturally or periodically cleaned/polished to restore brightness, depending on desired aesthetic.

name: Lockwood Oil Rubbed Bronze
description: A dark, rich bronze finish achieved through chemical darkening, often with rubbed highlights to simulate age.
notes_on_application: Popular for traditional and rustic styles. Finish may wear over time in high-contact areas.
care_instructions: Gentle cleaning with a soft, dry or slightly damp cloth.

name: Lockwood Aged Brass
description: An aged brass finish, offering a warm, vintage appearance that may continue to evolve over time.
notes_on_application: Suitable for achieving a classic, time-worn look.
care_instructions: Gentle cleaning. Patina development is often a desired feature.

name: Lockwood Architectural Bronze (Lacquered)
description: A durable architectural bronze finish, potentially lacquered for protection and consistent appearance.
care_instructions: Wipe with a soft cloth. If lacquered, avoid abrasives.

name: Lockwood Polished Brass (Lacquered)
description: Classic polished brass finish, typically lacquered to maintain brightness and prevent tarnishing.
care_instructions: Clean with a soft cloth. Avoid abrasives on lacquered surface.

name: Lockwood Satin Brass (Lacquered)
description: A satin brass finish providing a muted, warm gold tone, typically lacquered for durability.
notes_on_application: Offers a modern take on brass.

name: Lockwood Polished Brass Unlacquered
description: Unlacquered polished brass that will naturally tarnish and patina over time, developing a unique aged look.
notes_on_application: Chosen for its evolving appearance; not for those wanting a consistently bright finish.
care_instructions: Can be allowed to patina or polished to restore shine.

name: Lockwood Satin Brass Unlacquered
description: Unlacquered satin brass that will naturally tarnish and develop a patina, offering a soft, aged appearance.
notes_on_application: Evolves over time; for a dynamic, characterful look.
care_instructions: Can be allowed to patina or gently cleaned.

name: Lockwood Satin Chrome Plating
description: Durable electroplated satin chrome finish with a modern, brushed appearance. High corrosion resistance.
notes_on_application: Standard finish for a wide range of applications, including coastal areas.
care_instructions: Wipe with a soft, damp cloth. Avoid abrasive cleaners.

name: Lockwood Chrome Plating
description: Bright, reflective polished chrome plated finish. Durable and tarnish-resistant.
care_instructions: Wipe with a soft, dry or damp cloth. Buff to shine.

name: Lockwood Satin Stainless Steel
description: Finish achieved on solid stainless steel material, offering high durability and corrosion resistance.
notes_on_application: Ideal for exterior, coastal, and high-traffic applications. Grade of stainless steel (e.g., 304, 316) is key.
care_instructions: Clean with stainless steel cleaner or a soft cloth with mild detergent.

name: Lockwood Polished Stainless Steel
description: Highly polished finish on solid stainless steel material, offering a bright, reflective look with excellent durability.
notes_on_application: Suitable for premium applications, exterior use. Grade of stainless steel is important.
care_instructions: Wipe with a soft cloth; can be polished.

name: Lockwood Natural Anodized Aluminium
description: A durable, corrosion-resistant anodized finish on aluminium, typically resulting in a natural silver/grey matt appearance.
notes_on_application: Common for commercial aluminium door hardware and fittings.
care_instructions: Clean with mild detergent and water.
